title: Client repair hangs
body:
In the aforementioned gyazo link, it shows my LoL client hanging/stuck trying to repair (Or download? I don't know.) and I can't seem to get around it, I've tried multiple times throughout this month to no avail. I had to repair originally because upon trying to join a game, it did not put me into the game and the client gave me a prompt saying my files were corrupted (Or something along those lines)

Any advice?

replies.body:
Is the repair getting stuck at a certain point or is it just never actually working when it finishes? 

If it gets hung up it's likely due to a weird permissions issue. Make sure you're running the game as admin and setup the right admin settings following the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions). 

If it never actually works after the repair, it might be worth it to go ahead and run a full reinstall. In that case, grab the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run a **reinstall and clean uninstall**.
